name: photobooth-lan-print-server
description: Zero-install LAN print server for the PhotoBooth iPad app

scripts.package:win: npm run build && npx pkg dist/index.js -t node18-win-x64 --output photobooth-print-server.exe
scripts.package:mac: npm run build && npx pkg dist/index.js -t node18-macos-x64 --output photobooth-print-server
scripts.package:linux: npm run build && npx pkg dist/index.js -t node18-linux-x64 --output photobooth-print-server
